title: bhyamillai jayamuDu
sahitya:
bhayamillai jayamuNDu bhaymillaiyE pazhanik-kumara guru shuDarvaDivEluNDu


anupallavi

  sheyaluNDu balamuNDu paGhai en sheyyum shiva SaNmukhan aruL vazhi kATTumE


caraNam    hAlAhalam amudena uNDAn aruLiya tavak-kanalE kOlAhala vAlA pArvati bAlA bhaktarkk-anukUlA sharaN ena
